scripts.example:build:ios: yarn build && yarn workspace example build:ios
scripts.example:build:android: yarn build && yarn workspace example build:android
scripts.syncpkg: yarn workspaces run build && yarn --cwd ./example add file:../packages/vital-core-react-native file:../packages/vital-health-react-native file:../packages/vital-devices-react-native --check-files && yarn --cwd ./example build
